name: Mathooze
description:
Mathooze is a casual puzzle game designed for those who like maths puzzles on the likes of sudoku and people with a general interest in mathematics or numbers. The game has over 400 puzzles with many more coming soon!

Each puzzle is designed to take only a few minutes to resolve, with a relatively wide difficulty gradient allowing beginners to gradually progress towards more difficult puzzles, keeping the gameplay challenging without it being too repetitive or taking excessive amounts of time. Perfect for when you're waiting on that salty ass***e who's roping you in Hearthstone!

The game features a tip system so if you run into a puzzle that for some unknown reason seems to be much more complicated to you, you can simply use the coins earned so far to make the puzzle easier or to get hints to come to a resolution more speedily.
